caption.text:
Here is a couple of spread of the latest publication we designed for *designers interactifs*. In order to create a major survey regarding interaction design jobs, *designers interactifs* teamed up with @aquent_ , enabling us to deliver multiple data visualizations through 128 pages. Printed with great care by @deuxpontsmanufacture on Constellation Jade Intreccio by @fedrigonipapers and set partly in National by @klim_type_foundry for the titles. More pics will come up later.

#ateliertoutvabien #toutvabien #graphicdesign #datavisualization #data #bigdata #pantone #manufacturedesdeuxponts #aquent #designersinteractifs #ixd #sd #ux #fedrigoni #klimtypefoundry #survey
